'''"Knee-Deep Snow..."''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat a [[Cryo Hypostasis]] that has revived three times.

==Trivia==
*The Chinese name of this achievement forms an idiom when combined with the Chinese name of [["...A Single Night's Work"]]. The idiom referenced is {{Lang|mini=1|zh={{wt|冰凍三尺，非一日之寒#Proverb|冰冻三尺, 非一日之寒}}|zh_rm=bīngdòng sānchǐ, fēi yīrì zhī hán|zh_lit=it takes more than one cold day to freeze the river three {{w|Chi (unit)|chi}} deep}}, which describes a situation that is caused by the gradual accumulation of many smaller matters. The English equivalent is the saying "Rome wasn't built in a day."
